generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, under an overpass.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and dense green bushes along the right side of the road and behind the overpass.
- terrain: The ground beside the road, especially on the right, appears to be covered with grass and soil, forming a natural embankment.
- building: A large building with a brown roof and multiple windows is visible on the right side of the image, behind the vegetation.
- wall: A concrete wall runs along the left side of the road, forming a barrier between the road and adjacent structures.
- pole: A tall, vertical pole is visible in the center of the image, supporting the overhead structure.
- traffic sign: A small, rectangular traffic sign is mounted on the overhead structure above the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a white van and a dark-colored car, both traveling in the same direction as the viewpoint.
- truck: A white van, which is a type of truck, is visible on the left side of the road, partially obscured by vegetation.
